meaningMnemonic: <radical>Big</radical> <radical>products</radical> need to be put in a big <kanji>container</kanji>. A small container just won’t do. These products are big and they need a big container to be contained in.
readingMnemonic: Once you get the big products into a <kanji>container</kanji>, you then lock it with a <reading>key</reading> (き). You wouldn’t want these products to bust out of their containers, so it’s best to lock them up with a key.
